languages.text: "Я не нуждаюсь в твоем сочувствии, элантах". {n}Ирлиэт безразлично скользит взглядом по мостику, но уголки ее губ предательски тянутся вверх, а взгляд смягчается.{/n} "К тому же ни мон-кай, ни мои темные сородичи так и не нашли тлеющий скелет Крудараха. Быть может... еще не все потеряно. Быть может, утраченное еще можно вернуть".

traits.locale_text: "Я не нуждаюсь в твоем сочувствии, элантах". {n}Ирлиэт безразлично скользит взглядом по мостику, но уголки ее губ предательски тянутся вверх, а взгляд смягчается.{/n} "К тому же ни мон-кай, ни мои темные сородичи так и не нашли тлеющий скелет Крудараха. Быть может... еще не все потеряно. Быть может, утраченное еще можно вернуть".

languages.text: "I have no need for your sympathy, elantach." {n}Yrliet's gaze dimly wanders the bridge, but the corners of her lips twitch traitorously upward and her features soften.{/n} "Besides, neither mon-keigh nor my dark kin found the decaying remnants of Crudarach. Perhaps... all is not lost. Perhaps we may yet bring back what has been taken."
languages.original_text: "Я не нуждаюсь в твоем сочувствии, элантах". {n}Ирлиэт безразлично скользит взглядом по мостику, но уголки ее губ предательски тянутся вверх, а взгляд смягчается.{/n} "К тому же ни мон-кай, ни мои темные сородичи так и не нашли тлеющий скелет Крудараха. Быть может... еще не все потеряно. Быть может, утраченное еще можно вернуть".

traits.locale_text: "I have no need for your sympathy, elantach." {n}Yrliet's gaze dimly wanders the bridge, but the corners of her lips curl up and her features soften.{/n} "Besides, neither mon-keigh nor my dark cousins found the decaying remnants of Crudarach. Perhaps... not all is lost. Perhaps we may yet bring back what has been taken."

"I have no need for your sympathy, elantach." {n}Yrliet's gaze dimly wanders the bridge, but the corners of her lips curl up and her features soften.{/n} "Besides, neither mon-keigh nor my dark cousins found the decaying remnants of Crudarach. Perhaps... not all is lost. Perhaps we may yet bring back what has been taken."

Perhaps... not all is lost. Perhaps we may yet bring back what has been taken."

Perhaps... not all is lost. Perhaps we may yet bring back what has been taken."

"I have no need for your sympathy, elantach." {n}Yrliet's gaze dimly wanders the bridge, but the corners of her lips twitch traitorously upward and her features soften.{/n} "Besides, neither mon-keigh nor my dark kin found the decaying remnants of Crudarach. Perhaps... all is not lost. Perhaps we may yet bring back what has been taken."

"I have no need for your sympathy, elantach." {n}Yrliet's gaze dimly wanders the bridge, but the corners of her lips twitch traitorously upward and her features soften.{/n} "Besides, neither mon-keigh nor my dark kin found the decaying remnants of Crudarach. Perhaps... all is not lost. Perhaps we may yet bring back what has been taken."

languages.text: “我并不需要你的同情，外界人。”{n}伊莉耶特的目光朦胧地扫视着舰桥，但她的嘴角却不由自主地向上抽动，表情也变得柔和起来。{/n}“而且，无论是猴子，还是我那些阴暗的表亲，都还没有找到克鲁达拉赫腐朽的遗骸。或许……一切并没有彻底散佚。或许我们依然有机会，把被夺走的东西重新夺回。”
languages.original_text: "I have no need for your sympathy, elantach." {n}Yrliet's gaze dimly wanders the bridge, but the corners of her lips twitch traitorously upward and her features soften.{/n} "Besides, neither mon-keigh nor my dark kin found the decaying remnants of Crudarach. Perhaps... all is not lost. Perhaps we may yet bring back what has been taken."

traits.locale_text: “我并不需要你的同情，外界人。”{n}伊莉耶特的目光朦胧地扫视着舰桥，但她的嘴角却不由自主地向上抽动，表情也变得柔和起来。{/n}“而且，无论是猴子，还是我那些阴暗的表亲，都还没有找到克鲁达拉赫腐朽的遗骸。或许……它还没有彻底陷落。或许我们依然有机会，把被夺走的东西重新夺回。”

languages.original_text: "I have no need for your sympathy, elantach." {n}Yrliet's gaze dimly wanders the bridge, but the corners of her lips twitch traitorously upward and her features soften.{/n} "Besides, neither mon-keigh nor my dark kin found the decaying remnants of Crudarach. Perhaps... all is not lost. Perhaps we may yet bring back what has been taken."

languages.text: «No necesito tu simpatía, elantach». {n}La mirada de Yrliet se pasea vagamente por el puente, pero las comisuras de sus labios la traicionan curvándose hacia arriba. Sus facciones se suavizan.{/n} «Además, ni los mon-keigh ni mis primos oscuros han encontrado los restos en descomposición de Crudarach. Quizá... no todo esté perdido. Quizá aún podamos restaurar lo que hemos perdido».
languages.original_text: "I have no need for your sympathy, elantach." {n}Yrliet's gaze dimly wanders the bridge, but the corners of her lips twitch traitorously upward and her features soften.{/n} "Besides, neither mon-keigh nor my dark kin found the decaying remnants of Crudarach. Perhaps... all is not lost. Perhaps we may yet bring back what has been taken."

traits.locale_text: «No necesito tu simpatía, elantach». {n}La mirada de Yrliet se pasea vagamente por el puente, pero las comisuras de sus labios la traicionan curvándose hacia arriba. Sus facciones se suavizan.{/n} «Además, ni los mon-keigh ni mis primos oscuros han encontrado los restos en descomposición de Crudarach. Quizá... no todo esté perdido. Quizá aún podamos restaurar lo que hemos perdido».

languages.text: 「同情など必要ない、エランタ」{n}ユリエットの視線はぼんやりとブリッジをさまよったが、唇の端はそれと反対するように上向きに尖り、その表情は和らいでいた。{/n}「それに、モン＝ケイも私の闇の血族も、クルダラの朽ちた残骸を見つけられなかった。おそらく…すべてが失われたわけではない。奪われたものを取り戻すことができるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "I have no need for your sympathy, elantach." {n}Yrliet's gaze dimly wanders the bridge, but the corners of her lips twitch traitorously upward and her features soften.{/n} "Besides, neither mon-keigh nor my dark kin found the decaying remnants of Crudarach. Perhaps... all is not lost. Perhaps we may yet bring back what has been taken."

traits.locale_text: 「同情など必要ない、エランタ」{n}ユリエットの視線はぼんやりとブリッジをさまよったが、唇の端はそれと反対するように上向きに尖り、その表情は和らいでいた。{/n}「それに、モン＝ケイも私の闇の血族も、クルダラの朽ちた残骸を見つけられなかった。おそらく…すべてが失われたわけではない。奪われたものを取り戻すことができるかもしれない」

languages.text: "Ich brauche Euer Mitleid nicht, Elantach." {n}Yrliets Blick wandert teilnahmslos über die Brücke, doch ihre Mundwinkel zucken verräterisch nach oben und ihre Gesichtszüge werden weicher.{/n} "Zudem haben weder die Chem-Pan-Sey noch mein dunkles Volk je die verwesenden Überreste von Crudarach entdeckt. Vielleicht ... ist noch nicht alles verloren. Vielleicht können wir noch zurückholen, was uns genommen wurde."
languages.original_text: "I have no need for your sympathy, elantach." {n}Yrliet's gaze dimly wanders the bridge, but the corners of her lips twitch traitorously upward and her features soften.{/n} "Besides, neither mon-keigh nor my dark kin found the decaying remnants of Crudarach. Perhaps... all is not lost. Perhaps we may yet bring back what has been taken."

traits.locale_text: "Ich brauche Euer Mitleid nicht, Elantach." {n}Yrliets Blick wandert teilnahmslos über die Brücke, doch ihre Mundwinkel zucken verräterisch nach oben und ihre Gesichtszüge werden weicher.{/n} "Zudem haben weder die Chem-Pan-Sey noch mein dunkles Volk je die verwesenden Überreste von Crudarach entdeckt. Vielleicht ... ist noch nicht alles verloren. Vielleicht können wir noch zurückholen, was uns genommen wurde."

languages.text: « Je me passe de votre compassion, elantach. » {n}Yrliet parcourt la passerelle du regard en affectant l'indifférence, mais elle ne parvient pas à réprimer l'ombre d'un sourire qui adoucit ses traits.{/n} « De plus, ni les mon-keigh ni mes sombres cousins n'ont trouvé les vestiges de Crudarach. Peut-être que... tout n'est pas encore perdu, que nous avons encore une chance de reprendre ce que l'on nous a volé. »
languages.original_text: "I have no need for your sympathy, elantach." {n}Yrliet's gaze dimly wanders the bridge, but the corners of her lips twitch traitorously upward and her features soften.{/n} "Besides, neither mon-keigh nor my dark kin found the decaying remnants of Crudarach. Perhaps... all is not lost. Perhaps we may yet bring back what has been taken."

traits.locale_text: « Je me passe de votre compassion, elantach. » {n}Yrliet parcourt la passerelle du regard en affectant l'indifférence, mais elle ne parvient pas à réprimer l'ombre d'un sourire qui adoucit ses traits.{/n} « De plus, ni les mon-keigh ni mes cousins noirs n'ont trouvé les vestiges de Crudarach. Peut-être que... tout n'est pas perdu, que nous avons encore une chance de reprendre ce que l'on nous a volé. »

languages.text: "Senin şefkatine ihtiyacım yok elantach." {n}Yrliet'in ifadesiz bakışları köprüyü süzüyor. Dudaklarının kenarları tehditkâr bir ifadeyle yukarı doğru seğirirken yüz hatları yumuşuyor.{/n} "Ayrıca Crudarach'ın harabeye dönen kalıntılarını ne mon-keighler ne de kara soydaşım bulabildi. Belki de... Her şeyi yitirmemişizdir. Belki bizden alınanı geri getirmenin bir yolu vardır."
languages.original_text: "I have no need for your sympathy, elantach." {n}Yrliet's gaze dimly wanders the bridge, but the corners of her lips twitch traitorously upward and her features soften.{/n} "Besides, neither mon-keigh nor my dark kin found the decaying remnants of Crudarach. Perhaps... all is not lost. Perhaps we may yet bring back what has been taken."

traits.locale_text: "Şefkat göstermene ihtiyacım yok elantach." {n}Yrliet'in ifadesiz bakışları köprüyü süzüyor. Dudaklarının kenarları tehditkâr bir ifadeyle yukarı doğru seğirirken yüz hatları yumuşuyor.{/n} "Ayrıca Crudarach'ın harabeye dönen kalıntılarını ne mon-keighler ne de kara soydaşım bulabildi. Belki de... Her şeyi yitirmemişizdir. Belki bizden alınanı geri getirmenin bir yolu vardır."
